entry.title: The Workers Who Make Your Clothes Want Higher Pay. Who Should Pony Up?
entry.content: The armies of people who make clothes for Western brands are protesting for better wages, adding pressure to the era of ultracheap clothes on which many companies rely.

entry.title: China Tries to Lure Its Unemployed Youth to the Countryside
entry.content: The Communist Party seeks to deploy hundreds of thousands to rural communities, aiming to keep young people busy while city jobs are scarce.
